item.title: Pagegen static site generator
item.description: Pagegen is a static web site generator, it creates web sites from text files and directories. Manage your site from the command line.

item.title: Quick start
item.description: Introduction to Pagegen setup and getting started with site generation.

item.title: Pages
item.description: Pages consist of zero or more headers and content, which can be plain text, html or Markdown

item.title: Site
item.description: Directory structure of a Pagegen site.

item.title: Included plugins
item.description: Pagegen comes with several plugins included.

item.title: Plugin development
item.description: Brief guide to developing Pagegen plugins.

item.title: Apache and nginx setup tips
item.description: Pagegen user experience and SEO may be increased by configuring the web server appropriately.

item.title: Git deployment example
item.description: Push changes to remote server and trigger git hooks to deploy web site.
